reviews.review: Turn into trash game when the 6.1.0 version release. I know the developer is trying to make this game to be balance, but you can just buff the killer side then should be okay. However, the developer did buff the killer and also nerf the survivor. The Dead Hard is the most special perk at survivor side, but now become rubbish perk.

Started to play in 2018 (mostly survivor) I uninstalled this game twice but came back to it.
A lot of things are "wrong" in this game to keep it short... But it's the little things that I enjoy that are worth it for me.

Jedna strona jest ciagle oslabiana a ostatni blog tworcÃ³w pokazuje ze tak naprawde nie zalezy im na balansie i killerach. Zmiany jakie poczynili/ zamierzaja poczynic maja na celu tylko i wylacznie uprzyjemnienie gry nowym survivorom kosztem tz ,,power role'' (spoiler: wcale nia nie jest). A jak ,,kompetentni'' sa twÃ³rcy pokazuje fakt ze skoro nie sa w stanie naprawic match makingu to zamierzaja ukryc rangi graczy tak by np ranga 17 ( rangi sa od 20 do 1) grala przeciwko graczom na rangach 1-4.

Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ° Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ½ÑŒ Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ½Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ°ÑÑŒ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ½Ğ°ÑƒÑ‡Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒÑÑ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ

7/20/2022
new update

change list will apply

Pros
1.
Generators take 90 seconds for a single survivor to repair (was 80 seconds)
[personaly never liked the short gen times always felt like i was being gen rushed not just survivors doing gens]
2.
Killers kicking a generator now immediately cause a 2.5% loss of progress in addition to starting regression
love this help stall gens
3.
Bloodlust trigger times have been reduced to 15 seconds for Tier 1, 25 seconds for Tier 2, 
[helps in a chase]
4.
The following Killer actions have been sped up by 10%:
Time to kick a pallet or wall has been reduced to 2.34 seconds (was 2.6 seconds)
Time to kick a generator has been reduced to 1.8 seconds (was 2 seconds)
personal felt this was needed
5.
Added: Once the Hex's effect is revealed to the Survivors, its Hex Totem's aura is shown to the Survivors at a range of 4 meters. This range increases steadily over the next 30 seconds to 24 meters
needed

Cons
1.
Cooldown time after a successful hit has been reduced to 2.7 seconds (was 3 seconds)
[the problem here is we already have alot of perks to help here and honestly this harms survivors more then killer
the recover time for shits is the time it takes for a survivor to get away so this is unneeded]
2.
Added: The perk and its effects are disabled if the exit gates are powered.
OPENED NOT POWERED
3.
Reduced the grunts of pain volume reduction to 25/50/75% (was 50/75/100%)
love the exhausted part not the change tho it should be 100 for t3

C'est chiant car ce jeu a un gros potentiel que ca sois fun ou tryhard

Excelente para pasar el rato con los pibes, al principio es complicado agarrarle la mano a los survivors en el aspecto de escapar del killer; con el paso de las horas vas aprendiendo algun que otro truquillo y ser mucho mas sigiliso. Esto ultimo es mucho muy importante para el desarrollo de una partida, ya que el 70% te la pasas arreglando el generador o escondiendote, ademas de intentar huir,claro esta.
Por otro lado, no es un pay2win y hacerse con un personaje al nivel 50 cuesta mucho pero por los puntos que se ganan por game, desafios, y misiones diarias se lo sube bastante rapido. 
Un punto negativo, alguna que otra hitbox del killer al momento de atacar o los bugs con pallets al momento de levantar un survivor(es necesario desconectarse porque no te permite atacar), largas colas de espera cuando hay un tasa de 20k jugando(1:00 AM), compas que se desconectan a mitad de partida, etc.
En fin, es muy piola para jugar en premade, te permite hacerle la psicologica al asesina :V

Por ciertas horas debes esperar como 10 minutos maximo para encontrar partida, otras veces puedes jugarte 10 partidas seguidas, en Lima a partir de las 4 - 5 pm hay bastante gente online, en la noche a madrugada cuesta un poco encontrar. El juego en si es increible, no me pide demasiados requisitos (lo juego a 40 fps en mi laptop con una 840m y me es mas que suficiente), hay horas de diversiÃ³n y el juego no se vuelve repetivo o tedioso, algo que garantiza mucha permanencia en el juego.

Humildemente le doy un 8/10
fun, addicting, and annoying. shits busted but its still fun. fuck freddy and slinger

I like the game- it's just fun to play and has nice jump scare factor with the killer's being other players; makes for interesting game play for sure.
Bom jogo para jogar com amigos e xinga-los de raiva!
